videos.description: Elijah Harkless steals a pass and races coast-to-coast for the throwdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Harkless stuffs the stat sheet for Sooners with steal and slam) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harkless stuffs the stat sheet for Sooners with steal and slam

videos.description: Elijah Harkless dimes Jalen Hill for the two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Jalen Hill opens up the 2nd half with an OU slam) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jalen Hill opens up the 2nd half with an OU slam

videos.description: Simas Lukosius comes up clutch for Butler with a huge 3-pointer.

videos.headline: Simas Lukosius nails clutch 3 for Butler

videos.description: Elijah Harkless drains a 3-pointer to tie the score late for Oklahoma.

videos.headline: OU's Harkless splashes in massive game-tying 3

videos.description: Chuck Harris confidently knocks down the 3-pointer to put Butler ahead late in overtime.
